name: HyperBowl Seas
description:
Sail the High Seas in the fourth HyperBowl lane! Roll along the deck of the ship, fire the cannons, but don't drop below decks or fall overboard!

Swipe up along the screen to push the bowling ball forward, left and right to roll horizontally, down to push the ball back. Pinch to pause.

Tip: long swipes provide more power.

Join us on Facebook at hyperbowl.rocks for the latest news.

If you like this app, check out the full HyperBowl game with all of the original six lanes and several new ones!

Built with the original HyperBowl art and sound assets licensed from Hyper Entertainment, the Unity game engine from Unity Technologies, MacXWare Font Library, Lean Localization from Carlos Wilkes, Flocks package from soodaq, and the iTween library from pixelplacement.

HyperBowl is a registered trademark of Absolute Certainty Inc.
